publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2273 Bill Wilson: Banning Shock Collars: The Welsh Government’s Precedent—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement by the Welsh Assembly Government Rural Affairs Minister to move forward with a ban on electric shock collars in Wales and calls on the Scottish Government to issue the responses to the first consultation on this issue and ban the sale and use of shock collars in Scotland.

S3M-2273 Bill Wilson: Banning Shock Collars: The Welsh Government’s Precedent—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement by the Welsh Assembly Government Rural Affairs Minister to move forward with a ban on electric shock collars in Wales and calls on the Scottish Government to issue the responses to the first consultation on this issue and ban the sale and use of shock collars in Scotland.

S3M-2273 Banning Shock Collars: The Welsh Government’s Precedent (lodged on 26 June 2008) Bashir Ahmad*, Christine Grahame*, Robin Harper*, Rob Gibson*, Elaine Murray*, Robert Brown*, Sandra White*, Bill Kidd*, Stuart McMillan*
S3M-2273 Banning Shock Collars: The Welsh Government’s Precedent (lodged on 26 June 2008) Irene Oldfather*
